entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Forms: v4.3.11
entry.content:
v4.3.11 - 2025-03-31

Full Changelog

Fixed

  • [stable4] Fix(migration): Rename primary key of uploaded_files table by @backportbot[bot] in #2650
  • [stable4] Fix: Handle invalid form hashes correctly by @backportbot[bot] in #2666

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Forms: v4.3.12

v4.3.12 - 2025-04-03

Full Changelog

Fixed

  • [stable4] fix: quote cell values to prevent formula evaluation by @backportbot[bot] in #2675

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Forms: v5.1.0
entry.content:
v5.1.0 - 2025-04-03

Full Changelog

Enhancements

  • feat(date): allow restrictions for dates and query date ranges by @Chartman123 in #2646

Fixed

  • fix: quote cell values to prevent formula evaluation by @Chartman123 in #2674
  • Fix: Handle invalid form hashes correctly by @Chartman123 in #2655

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Forms: v5.1.1
entry.content:
v5.1.1 - 2025-06-25

Full Changelog

Fixed

  • [stable5] fix: Preserve intermediate changes when updating answer text by @backportbot[bot] in #2801
  • [stable5] fix: properly set string values in exports to escape formulas by @backportbot[bot] in #2797
  • [stable5] fix(validation): Update validationType handling by @backportbot[bot] in #2793

Merged

  • [stable5] chore(QuestionMultiple): update "Other" answer handling to use v-model and add change handler by @backportbot[bot] in #2800
  • [stable5] fix: address vue warnings in console by @backportbot[bot] in #2798
  • [stable5] chore: Simplify props usage by removing unnecessary bindings in various components by @backportbot[bot] in #2792
  • [stable5] chore(QuestionDate): refactor handling of computed props by @backportbot[bot] in #2794
  • [stable5] chore: fix linting on CI by @backportbot[bot] in #2795
  • [stable5] Mention file type in docs by @backportbot[bot] in #2791

v5.1.2 - 2025-07-07
